Author: jward
Content:
If I could prove what could still be done in CS I'd do it myself and become rich and famous ;)

As for something I saw recently that blew my mind was video of a presentation at google. The premise was figuring out how to have a system automatically compress, decompress, and predict based on arbitrary data. I wish I could find the link. Very neat stuff.

No matter what, there's always more to learn and discover.
